main.name: John "Tuc" Baldecchi
main.description: I am a self taught programmer that originally began my career as a management consultant but realized that I wanted to push myself and transitioned myself over to the career path of Software Development. With hard work, discipline, and mentorship, I have been able to make that change and wake up everyday loving that decision.
main.bio: My expertise is in developing front end and back end components for serverless applications on the cloud. I have focused on Amazon Web Services (AWS) as my cloud platform of choice and earned certifications, the AWS Cloud Practitioner and AWS Associate Developer certifications, to improve my knowledge of this platform. Additionally, I continue to improve my skills in Full Stack development with personal projects. In addition to my software development experience, I have a unique background in working with high-level enterprise stakeholders, managing international subcontracting teams, simplifying complex software requirements, and improving business processes.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
